title: How to make a touchless sanitizer dispenser with Arduino - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A So, you will be requiring a High Tourqe servo motor, A photosensor/ proximity sensor, and an Arduino with some connecting wires. Fix the horn of the servo motor with the squeezing pump of the dispenser, and fix the sensor in front or any side of the bottle. Then connect the wires and implement the logic to rotate the servo motor only when the hand is detected. That’s all, here your “Touch-less sanitizer Dispenser” is ready to use. Hope you got the answer… Happy coding…
Use high torque servo motor, small arduino such as arduino nano and a distance sensor such as ultrasonic sensor. You san find more tutorials over youtube.
